name: Matter
description:
Explore a mystic and expressive world in a dynamic first person plateformer. Dive in a dreamlike and abstract world where matter evolves and lives around you according to your actions.Features:
  • Half an hour of titillating adventure
  • Pleasurable and mellow platforming
  • Disorienting and exotic landscapes
  • Relaxing, dynamic and disturbing soundtrack
  • No violence
  • No frustration
  • No competition
  • Just pleasure!
Made by Concrete Games:
Game Design & Programing by
    @MatoLabu

Visuals, Music & Sound by
    @Tomavatars

2D & 3D Arts by
    Elie Monferran

Level Building, VFX & Programing by
    Paul Vaillé
